module.name: location_in_building
module.keywords: module, placement of building item, placement of component of building element, placement of building level

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of location information of building items, components building items and sections of buildings.

inscope.li: the characterization of the location of building items;
the characterization of the location of components of building items;
the characterization of the location of building sections.

outscope.li: the characterization of building items and components of building items;
the characterization of the shape of buildings and parts of buildings.

uof.name: Location_in_building
uof.description: The Location_in_building UoF specifies the data structure for the representation of the location of building items, components of building items and sections of buildings.
